tasks.label: Java Hot Reload
tasks.command: ./mvnw clean package; docker cp ./target/mystichomecreation.war mystichome:/opt/glassfish7/glassfish/domains/domain1/autodeploy/web.war; docker run --rm -v .:/app -w /app node:22 sh -c 'rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json; npm cache clean --force; npm install -g npm@latest; npm install tailwindcss@3 postcss autoprefixer; npx tailwindcss -i ./src/main/webapp/Content/css/tailwind.css -o ./src/main/webapp/Content/css/output.css --minify'; if (Test-Path node_modules) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules }; echo '@@@@@@@@@@BUILD SUCCESS@@@@@@@@@@@'

tasks.label: Java Build/Start Containers
tasks.command: docker-compose down; docker build -t mystichome .; docker-compose up
